channel.title: I really need a coder for a 508 rsps and maybe a hoster?
channel.description:
HOPE THIS IS CORRECT PLACE I DONT WANNA BE BANNED!
Okay, im okay at coding but tthere is alot of things i cant do! so this is why i need a decant coder! My server isnt 24/7 but could be soon if i get a mate to host (or any1 else) yeh i know... then technically im not the owner then! Okay one of tht shit in comments please! Just any1 who is willing to do the job!
Thanks!

item.title: I really need a coder for a 508 rsps and maybe a hoster?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

You should try looking at some of the tutorials in the tutorial section, and download a clean 508 base. Then will the tutorials not only make your server better, but also improve your knowledge of Java itself. Good luck :).

PS I’m not trying to increase the size of my E-Penis, I’m just “Helpin da newbz”
PPS Try posting in the RS2 development boards next time.

Read full topic

item.title: I really need a coder for a 508 rsps and maybe a hoster?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Billybobfred:

LOOK STOP SPAMMING IT UP! THERE IS NO POINT JUST Copying SUM THING!ur just doing it for posts!

[CENTER]

You really think so? ^.-[/CENTER]

There is no section for this. You’re not allowed to request hosters or coders.

[quote=“snoopy89, post:10, topic:312136”][quote author=lol k link=topic=408579.msg3016003#msg3016003 date=1257195668]
wrong section
[/quote]

[quote author=EndlessLife link=topic=408579.msg3016661#msg3016661 date=1257249666]
Wrong section, Fail.
[/quote][/quote][quote=“yong min, post:13, topic:312136”][quote author=EndlessLife link=topic=408579.msg3016661#msg3016661 date=1257249666]
Wrong section, Fail.
[/quote][/quote]

It only needs to be said once, and post count does NOT increase the size of your E-Penis. Don’t believe the lies they tell you. :3
